text:
All for a man: the best finds of AliExpress and other stores
05 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Anton Martynov
Gadgets, tools, clothing, accessories and other useful products for men that Lifehacker found in a week.
Sign up for the weekly newsletter with the best finds on AliExpress. And on the Telegram ‚Äë channels ‚ÄúNakhodka‚Äù and ‚ÄúEverything for the peasant‚Äù you will find interesting goods, collections and promotions.
Lenovo Smartphone



Lenovo Z5 Pro GT smartphone with a 6.39-inch display, a Snapdragon 855 processor, 8 GB of RAM and 128/256 GB storage. The battery capacity is 3,350 mAh. For shooting, there is a main camera with 24 + 16 megapixel sensors and a frontal retractable camera with 16 + 8 megapixel sensors. Works on Android 9.0, supports NFC.
Price: from 18 871 rubles.

Buy

Door bell



Wireless doorbell with four modes of operation, indicator light and volume control. The transmitter works without batteries, and the receiver is connected to the mains.
Price: from 1 093 rubles.

Buy

Mittens Under Armor



Water-repellent knitted mittens. They have elastic cuffs and rubberized pads for better grip.
Price: 2 151 rubles.

Buy

Set-top box



MX10 TV box on Android 9.0 with support for 4K resolution, H.265 codec and HDR10. Equipped with 4 GB of RAM, HDMI 2.0 and USB 3.0 ports, as well as a Wi ‚Äë Fi module. There are versions with 32 or 64 GB of ROM.
Price: from 2 354 rubles.

Buy

SSDs



SATA 3 internal SSDs with capacities from 120 GB to 1 TB. The maximum read speed is 540 MB / s, the write speed is 450 MB / s.
Price: from 1 299 rubles.

Buy

LED Strip Light



Tape length from 0.5 to 2 m with a controller and remote control. It is powered via a USB connector. Suitable for lighting in an apartment, office or car. The controller supports synchronization with music.
Price: from 456 rubles.

Buy

Headphones BlitzWolf



BlitzWolf BW FYE5 in-ear headphones with Bluetooth 5.0 support and built-in microphone. Battery capacity lasts about 3 hours listening to music. Protected from moisture and suitable for sports.
Price: from 2 192 rubles.

Buy

Bath organizer



Organizer for toothbrushes, razors, hairbrushes, mouthwashes and other accessories. There is an automatic dispenser for toothpaste.
Price: from 893 rubles.

Buy

RAM



Kllisre DDR4 RAM, which supports dual-channel mode. 4, 8 and 16 GB modules are available with a frequency of 2 133, 2 400 or 2 666 MHz.
Price: from 1 101 rubles.

Buy

Jacket Warren Webber



Jacket made of quick-drying material with synthetic winterizer, zipper and side pockets.
Price: 4 206 rubles.

Buy

Portfolio Fedon 1919



Briefcase made of textile and genuine leather with a flap on the lock. Inside there are plenty of pockets for gadgets, documents, and writing utensils. Outside - a removable shoulder strap with adjustable length, on the back wall - a large pocket with a zipper.
Price: 4 779 rubles.

Buy

Xenomorph figures



A set of several collectible xenomorph figures: a pair of face grippers are placed in capsules about 18 cm high with backlight.
Price: 1 364 rubles.

Buy

Coffee maker Vitek



The Vitek VT ‚Äë 1517 horn coffee maker with automatic cleaning system prepares espresso, cappuccino and latte continuously for several cups. It is equipped with water and milk tanks of 1.65 liters and 0.3 liters, respectively.
Price: 7 964 rubles.

Buy

USB hub



A desk-mounted hub with three or four USB 3.0 ports and 3.5 mm jacks for headphones and a microphone. Also available is a model with a card reader instead of an audio interface.
Price: from 1 425 rubles.

Buy

Mixer



Quality copper faucet in a minimalist design. Four color-coated options and two chrome-plated models are available.
Price: from 1 310 rubles.

Buy

Xiaomi Toaster



The compact Xiaomi Pinlo grill toaster supports six time settings and is equipped with a removable grill that allows you to cook not only bread, but also other products, including dried fish, cheeses and potatoes. It will help in a couple of minutes to prepare a light snack at home or in the workplace.
Price: 1,572 rubles.

Buy

Xiaomi multitool



The multitool Xiaomi Mijia NexTool 10 in 1 is made of alloy steel with pliers, wire cutters, a miniature hacksaw, screwdrivers, a knife, an opener, scissors and a magnesium rod for lighting a bonfire.
Price: 1 734 rubles.

Buy

Thundeal Projector



Thundeal T26K projector with 1,080p optical resolution. It produces a luminous flux with a brightness of 5,500 lumens. There are HDMI, VGA and USB ports for connecting to an image source. The life of the LED lamp is about 30,000 hours. Equipped with automatic keystone correction system.
Price: from 14 547 rubles.

Buy


Note! All prices are valid at the time of publication of the collection. Stores can update the value of goods throughout the day.
